text: iman kontavarkale! Enakku virotiyakavum, unkalukku virotiyakavum iruppavarkalaip piriyattin karanattal irakaciyac ceytikalai etuttukkattum urra nanparkalakkik kollatirkal; (enenil) unkalitam vantulla cattiya (veta)ttai avarkal nirakarikkirarkal, ninkal unkal iraivanana allahvin mitu iman kontatarkaka, ittutaraiyum, unkalaiyum veliyerrukirarkal, en pataiyil porituvatarkakavum, en poruttattai natiyum ninkal purappattiruntal (avarkalai nanparkalakkik kollatir; kal, appotu) ninkal piriyattal avarkalitattil irakaciyattai velippatutti vitukirirkal, anal, ninkal maraittuvaippataiyum, ninkal velippatuttuvataiyum nan nanku arintavan. Melum, unkaliliruntum evar itaic ceykiraro avar nervaliyai tittamaka tavara vittuvittar
